title: South Korea's new president warns KJU that he will 'punish' provocations
description: South Korea's president had strong words of warning for the North Korean regime Wednesday, telling dictator Kim Jong Un to forgo any acts of provocation or face consequences.

title: Ukraine raises flag over Snake Island in war gain
description: Ukrainian soldiers have once again raised the Ukrainian flag over the infamous Snake Island after more months of Russian occupation.

title: Ukraine war victim brutalized by Russian military recovering months later
description: A Ukrainian man had his fingers cut off and lost half of his right foot to frostbite when he was tortured by Russian soldiers in the early days of Putin's invasion.

title: Russia confirms 6 Belarusian soldiers fighting for Ukraine captured or killed in Luhansk
description: Roughly six Belarusian soldiers who volunteered to fight in Ukraine against Russia's invasion were confirmed on Wednesday to have been captured or killed.

title: Belgium treaty vote could set Iranian terrorist free
description: Belgium's parliament looks set to pass a controversial prisoner swap treaty that some fear could pave the way to set terrorists free.

title: Putin aide warns against US pressing for war crimes court
description: Dmitry Medvedev of Russia warned the U.S. that it would face the "wrath of God" if the country pursues efforts to establish an international investigation of Russia's actions in Ukraine.

title: Ukraine war: American teenager transports 54 bags of medical supplies for Ukraine military
description: Matthew Geiling raised money locally and used it to help 'Ukraine Friends' gather and organize medical supplies the Ukrainian military desperately needs.

title: Russia's Shoigu says war in Ukraine will end when Putin's 'tasks' are completed
description: Russian Defense Minister Sergei Shoigu said the Kremlin's war in Ukraine will not end until President Vladimir Putin's goals are relatized.

title: Ukrainians brace for Belarus-led land invasion by July, escalating Putin's war
description: Ukrainians in the north and west brace for a land invasion by Belarus come mid-July as Russia's war continues to rage in the east and south.

title: Putin's NATO comments merely effort to 'reframe' Ukraine invasion failures: experts
description: Military experts advised that Putin's comments may not mean much strategically, his position as a world leader with a nuclear arsenal adds weight to anything he says.

title: Sweden and Finland closer to joining NATO as member nations sign accession protocols
description: All 30 NATO allies signed accession protocols for Sweden and Finland to join the alliance on Tuesday after Turkey dropped its opposition to the expansion.

title: Terror linked Iran karate team visa denied, will not compete in World Games in Alabama
description: Iran's karate team, was slated to enter the U.S. later this week to take part in The World Games in Birmingham, Alabama. Regime opponents claim the team is closely linked to an Iranian terror group.

title: Zelenskyy says Belarus involvement in war with Russia can be avoided
description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy said Tuesday that Belarusian involvement in Russia's war in Ukraine can be avoided.

title: Russia's war on Ukraine: 5 reasons why Putin won't stop
description: Putin believes he's forced a tipping point on the ground in Ukraine, that economic sanctions have backfired, and that war fatigue and "energy attacks" will weaken the West's resolve.

title: Ukraine announces $750 billion 'recovery plan' as Russia hones in on Donetsk
description: Ukrainian officials announce a $750 billion recovery plan and urge the international community to join for the "maintenance of global peace."

title: One-time rising star Jason Kander won his battle with PTSD, but he's in no rush to return to politics
description: Jason Kander says if his new book “INVISIBLE STORM: A Soldier’s Memoir of Politics and PTSD” was around a 15 years ago, he would have quickly sought treatment after his military service

title: NYC temple members travel to Ukraine border to bring comfort and 'bear witness'
description: Members of the Jewish congregation of Temple Emanu-El of NYC traveled to the Ukraine-Poland border recently, to bring comfort, bear witness and share their findings with others.

title: European support for Ukrainian recovery may rely on country reforming 'social policies'
description: The Ukrainian Recovery Conference says Ukraine's continued progress on human rights and LGBT inclusion "will be essential" to Ukraine's recovery after Russia's invasion.

title: Pope Francis dismisses rumors about resigning, says he wants to visit Moscow, Kyiv
description: Pope Francis shot down rumors that he will soon resign and said he is planning to visit Canada this month. He hopes to then travel to Moscow and Kyiv.

title: Chris Cuomo returns to social media with on-scene photos from Ukraine
description: Former CNN anchor Chris Cuomo broke his Instagram silence after sharing photos and videos from Ukraine several months after being fired from the network.

title: Ukrainian orphans stranded as American families struggle to save them from war
description: Two hundred American families are despondent because they must wait to adopt Ukrainian orphans. The war in Ukraine, red tape and Kyiv's tough adoption laws mean the children suffer even more.

title: Ukrainian missile strike kills three in Russia, Kremlin claims
description: A Ukrainian missile strike hit the Russian border city of Belgorod on Sunday, killing three and damaging dozens of buildings, Russian authorities are claiming.

title: The July 4th conversation we should have about the true cost of war
description: July 4th should be a time for Americans to reflect on the cost of war, what we demand from the men and women in our military and the toll that takes on them.
